About Me

Who am I?

Hi there! I’m Ignacio

Short Bio

I’m a Biomedical Engineer fascinated by the human body – from molecules to complex organ systems – and by the ways technology can help us understand and improve it. I enjoy solving problems with code, whether analyzing medical data, processing images, or exploring AI applications in healthcare.

I graduated in Biomedical Engineering from the University of Málaga, balancing strong academics with hands-on experiences that shaped my professional path.

During an Erasmus in Finland, I had the chance to worked with EEG and ECG signals for pathology detection, which sparked my interest in signal processing. In My bachelor’s, I applied AI techniques to identify radiation-induced chromosomal abnormalities in micrographs.

I aim to continue growing in the medical technology field, particularly in medical data science, imaging, and AI-driven solutions that support and improve healthcare.

Ignacio

My Experiences

  1.

    Junior Software Specialist

    Vodafone Intelligent Solutions | Jan 2025- Present

    I develop full-stack solutions with Angular and Java (Spring) for a German client, collaborate in international and Agile teams, create reusable Storybook components, implemente automated tests with Cypress, and use CI/CD pipelines in a Linux environment.

  2. Master in Big Data, Data Science, and AI

    Complutense University of Madrid | Feb 2025- Feb 2026

    I built ML and Deep Learning models in Python (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow/Keras), applied NLP with Hugging Face and BERT, created Tableau dashboards, and deployed solutions using APIs and cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Colab.

  3. Bsc. Biomedical Engineering

    University of Málaga | Sept 2018 - Jul 2024

    I applied Python for data manipulation and Machine Learning, implemented Data Structures and Algorithms in Java (OOP), modeled and queried SQL databases, and performed statistical analysis in R to solve problems in human anatomy and physiology.

Other Interests

Healthy Lifestyle & Science

I love maintaining a healthy and active lifestyle. Running is one of my favorite ways to challenge myself and push my limits.

I am fascinated by science and passionate about continuous learning. Also, teaching and guiding people allows me to communicate complex ideas clearly, combining my curiosity for learning with my desire to inspire others to take care of their physical and mental well-being.

Cooking & Gardening

Cooking is another important part of my life. I enjoy exploring dishes from different cultures and improvising my own creations. For me, cooking is a way to connect with memories and experiences.

Recently, I have started gardening, growing aromatic herbs that I use in my cooking.

Video Games & Creativity

Video games are a way for me to explore my creativity. I mainly play Minecraft, where I enjoy building constructions that expand my cities and designing transportation networks that enhance connections between locations.

I am also developing a viking age inspired RPG game, which allows me to create my own universe, bring characters to life, and enhance my skills in drawing, pixel art, map creation, and storytelling.
